restrict_content.subscribe_text: This content is only available to premium subscribers
restrict_content.email_text: Already a premium subscriber? Enter the email address used when purchasing below, to receive a login link to access.
restrict_content.email_check_text: Check your email and click the link to login, or enter the code from the email below.
restrict_content.no_access_text: Your account does not have access to this content. Please use the button below to purchase, or enter the email address you used to purchase the product.
